column1: i remember a time when being an officer of the law meant.honor fearless.loyal,my father was one of this brotherhood. adored torch song trilogy. ..amazeballs love you so cute,funny..dramatic..all in one package..who da thunk it.. well another day. not sure what more i can do...i am trying and calling everyone i can thin... to add injury to insult, my 1996 pos of a   just died..when it rain it pours...geeze o l... nature at her finest.. love this my. father...r.i.p. dad could you plz explain more..thankyou well raining season is coming..maybe i should stack up on umbrellas..and the septic system... i'm raising money for new roof...ceptic tank..flooring . click to donate: via kelly osborne. stay out of it.. i'm raising money for new roof...ceptic tank..flooring . click to donate: via i just entered the #25grandinyourhand sweeps for a chance to win $25k! details--> i'm raising money for new roof...ceptic tank..flooring . click to donate: #gofundme please and re-tweet i'm raising money for new roof...ceptic tank..flooring . click to donate: #gofundme well when it rains they say it pours...and right now it is doing both for the next ten hours..alwa... i'm raising money for new roof...ceptic tank..flooring . click to donate: #gofundme so the weather man says rain for monday..get the bowls pots and buckets ready...got up last nite w... i would never want anyone to think this is a scam...... are you the same kind of sweetheart in real life as you portray on the show...just asking
